document_notes.text:
This update for glib2 fixes the following issues:

- CVE-2024-52533: Fixed a single byte buffer overflow (bsc#1233282).
document_notes.title: Details

notes.text: gio/gsocks4aproxy.c in GNOME GLib before 2.82.1 has an off-by-one error and resultant buffer overflow because SOCKS4_CONN_MSG_LEN is not sufficient for a trailing '\0' character.
notes.title: Vulnerability Description
